statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, location FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, interests FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE interests LIKE '%music%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_name, interests FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles')
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY location
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE interests LIKE '%music%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, interest_category FROM customers JOIN customer_interests ON customers.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id WHERE interest_category = 'Sports';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, customer_interests.interest_category FROM customers JOIN customer_interests ON customers.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city='New York';
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT c.first_name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code FROM customers c INNER JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id;
SELECT c.first_name, p.preference_1, p.preference_2, p.preference_3 FROM customers c LEFT JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM addresses ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT customer_id, income, marital_status FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY first_name DESC
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE c.age < 40 AND a.state='CA'

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, c.first_name, c.last_name, d.income FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.income > 50000 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.city, a.zip_code, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.occupation='Engineer' ORDER BY a.zip_code ASC
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, income, education_level FROM demographics;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, income, occupation FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE income >= 50000 AND education_level = 'Bachelor'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, age, location, revenue FROM customers JOIN campaign_results ON customers.customer_id = campaign_results.customer_id WHERE revenue > 500 ORDER BY age DESC
